folder: Buffalo Avenue & Bergen Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Buffalo Avenue, at the S. E. corner of Bergen Street, showing the Buffalo Methodist Espicopal Church. On the left (view 2) is St. Josephs Institute, 113 Buffalo Avenue.

May 8, 1936
Views 1,2
View 3: July 13, 1940

P. L. Sperr

view 3: Neg. No. A-1039
